## Check the data exists

```{r excelFilePlaces}
allFilesThere <- TRUE

### Is there a (correctly named) Portsmouth-2018 file (in the right place) --------------------
ifelse(file.exists(here("data/portsmouthLeaders2018.xlsx")),
       "Portsmouth 2018 File Found :)",
       {
         # If file exists on O drive
         if(file.exists("O:\\WCC\\Learning and Development\\Research\\PROJECT - Portsmouth 2019 onwards\\Strand 2 - Evaluation of Pioneer Programme\\Quantitative\\Data\\portsmouthLeaders2018.xlsx")){
           # Copy file from O Drive
           file.copy(from = "O:\\WCC\\Learning and Development\\Research\\PROJECT - Portsmouth 2019 onwards\\Strand 2 - Evaluation of Pioneer Programme\\Quantitative\\Data\\portsmouthLeaders2018.xlsx",
                     to = here("data"))
           "Portsmouth 2018 succesfully copied from O drive"
         } else {
         allFilesThere <- FALSE
       "Portsmouth 2018 File not found and O:// drive not available: Please place 'portsmouthLeaders2018.xlsx' in the 'data' directory and knit this document again"}})

### Is there a (correctly named) Portsmouth-2019 file (in the right place) --------------------

       "Portsmouth 2019 File Found :)",

           # Copy file from O Drive
           file.copy(from = "O:\\WCC\\Learning and Development\\Research\\PROJECT - Portsmouth 2019 onwards\\Strand 2 - Evaluation of Pioneer Programme\\Quantitative\\Data\\portsmouthLeaders2019.xlsx",
```
